column1: Fluoride is a chemical commonly used to prevent tooth decay.

Fluoride is found in many over-the-counter and prescription products, including: - Certain mouthwashes and toothpastes - Certain vitamins (Tri-Vi-Flor, Poly-Vi-Flor, Vi-Daylin F) - Fluoridated water - Sodium fluoride liquid and tablets Fluoride may also be found in other household items, including - Etching cream - Roach powders Note: This list may not be all-inclusive.
